subject: Re: re:--speak jet sample
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
Ummmm pizzaaaa!! I'm trying lose the old man gut!  Been eating one 
meal a day, and few snacks--so ditsier than ever! 

 The Speakjet board is portable, although not in a box, or cabinet. 
It needs the software to produce random speech, and a way to 
interface it to a cpu.

 We should make it an EVPers night out/conference/food fight--er 
fest. I have not been out all friggin' winter! Not since the Stanley.

 Frank-S
